name: Anton Karlsson
about:
Anton is a person who likes to be a part of the entire process of development, so that he can learn and to have a better impact on the project. He has a big interest in app development and is currently working on an hobby project in react native. 

He always want to learn new things so that he can become a better developer. So challenges is something he welcomes. He enjoys working in an agile team where you work closely with your colleagues to solve problems in the most efficient way. Anton have experience as a support technician which really helps with social interactions and help him and his team grow. 

Anton excels at React and JavaScript/TypeScript development, especially when it comes to web development.

projects.name: Notes4Games
projects.hint: Scoreboards for your card games. Created with React Native.

projects.name: MovieListApp
projects.hint: List of movies and what they are about.

projects.name: More to come...
projects.hint: I have a great idea which is not public yet.

experience.name: Afry X
experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Anton started with being responsible for a front-end application which was about buildings. During this project Anton got mentored about being a Scrum Master. Anton later moved on to another Project about buildings where he became the Scrum Master for the team and also worked as a developer. In this project Anton Contributed to the development and release of several new features which is today used by hundreds of Users.
experience.cert: Certified Scrum Master (CSM), AZ-900 Azure Fundamentals

experience.name: Yabs
experience.title: SW Developer at Assa Abloy
experience.description: Anton started out with researching H2O.ai and developed models that could be used in java applications. Since October Anton is working in a utility team that develops libraries for other teams. After 6 months of working in the team, Anton had been a part of releasing 3 new libraries.

experience.name: Yabs
experience.title: App Developer Inhouse
experience.description: Anton was working on a project for the customer BiznizTools, where he was working on a mobile app in React Native. He worked in a small agile team where he mostly focused on developing the UI for a new feature.

experience.name: Jönköping University
experience.title: Computer Technology with Mobile Platforms
experience.description: Anton studied at Jönköping University about computer technology with mobile platforms. He studied the basics of programming and started out with C and C++. The education gave Anton a good starting point for his carrer. He found a big interest in Android development and app development which made him discover React Native and become more interested ni front-end. He also learnt about python and network-programming, aswell as IOS development using Swift. The last course Anton had was about Agile and Scrum which he also found extra interesting. And now he is a certified Scrum Master.
